entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
